Patagonian Cultural Immersion

Immerse yourself in Patagonia's culture with this extensive tour. Explore Puerto Montt's historical sites, engage with Chiloé's island traditions, and participate in Mapuche cultural events. Perfect for those eager to delve deep into the diverse cultures and rich history of Patagonia.

Detailed Itinerary with Highlights and Activities

  • Day 1-2: Arrival in Puerto Montt, welcome dinner with local delicacies, city tour.
  • Day 3-4: Visit to Chiloé Island for wooden church tours, traditional curanto meal preparation.
  • Day 5-6: Guided tours of indigenous Mapuche communities, participate in craft workshops.
  • Day 7: Cultural festival in Punta Arenas with folk dances and music.
  • Day 8: Departure.

Inclusions

Luxury accommodations, all meals (including several specialty dining experiences), all ground transportation, entry fees for all attractions, bilingual cultural guide.

Pricing and Availability

Pricing varies based on accommodation choice and season. Customizable options available.
